privacy.title: ğŸ”’ Privacy & Data Management
privacy.description: Manage your personal data stored by this bot
privacy.delete_confirmation: âš ï¸ Delete All My Data
privacy.delete_warning:
This will permanently delete all your data from our systems. This action cannot be undone!

**What will be deleted:**
â€¢ Your verification status
â€¢ Alliance membership
â€¢ Event history
â€¢ Language preferences
â€¢ All associated records

**Note:** You will need to verify again to use the bot.
